short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace words and phrases with translations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Belugaro - Learn a Language While You Browse
Transform your browsing experience into an immersive language learning journey with Belugaro! Our Chrome extension integrates language learning seamlessly into your everyday online activity, helping you learn passively as you explore your favorite websites.

Key Features:
🌍 Immersive Learning Experience:
Belugaro replaces words in your browser with the language you’re learning, creating an effortless way to practice vocabulary and sentence structures in real-time.

📈 Customized Learning Progression:
Belugaro adapts to your pace! Words that you encounter frequently are highlighted and gradually fade as you master them, ensuring that your learning is always relevant and personalized.

📅 Daily Lessons:
Receive daily language lessons based on your browsing habits and the words you interact with most often. No need to schedule study sessions—learn effortlessly while browsing!

📊 Detailed Analytics & Progress Tracking:
Track your progress with in-depth analytics. See how many words you've learned, how often you've encountered new terms, and monitor your overall language journey over time.

🔊 Audio Assistance:
Listen to native pronunciation of the words directly within the extension, perfecting your pronunciation as you go.

Why Belugaro?
🕒 No Time? No Problem!
We understand how hard it is to set aside time for traditional language apps. With Belugaro, you don’t need extra time—it integrates seamlessly into your existing routine, so you can learn as you browse.

🌟 Learn Any Time, Anywhere
Belugaro works across any website, adapting to your needs as you explore the web. Whether you’re shopping online, reading articles, or scrolling through social media, you’ll be building your language skills without even realizing it.

💡 Languages Supported:
Belugaro currently supports French and Spanish and is constantly expanding!

Get Started Today!
Install Belugaro and start learning today—right where you spend your time most, your browser! With customized lessons, built-in tracking, and audio support, mastering a new language has never been easier.
